news.title: Algorithms Should Have Made Courts More Fair. What Went Wrong?
news.description: A study of Kentucky’s use of algorithms in making pretrial release decisions has revealed a system that is missing policy goals and creating new inequities for people of color.

news.title: Lawyers, Cybersecurity, and Data Breaches: Your Ethical Obligations
news.description: Current ethics authority requires lawyers to remain up-to-date on technology issues impacting their practice, and encourages them to proactively prepare for data breaches.

news.title: Legal Jobs Leap Upward in August
news.description: Reporting the highest number of legal jobs in a decade, the legal industry added over 4,000 jobs in August, representing an increase of almost 6,000 jobs since last August.

news.title: At $1.2 Billion, It’s Already a Record Year for Legal Tech Investment
news.description: With a few months still left in 2019, legal tech investments have already topped last year’s record amount of $1 billion, and are reported to be distributed across 41 companies.
